About me

Hello! My name is Muhammed Alsayed and I am a front-end developer who is looking to make a change for the community, interested in programming, open to learning everything about technology, specifically web fields with good knowledge in front-end development, and a fast self-learner. I believe in knowledge transfer and can easily collaborate and share knowledge with my colleagues and learn from them.
